name: Ronnie's Runners
description:
Ronnie and his Friends need to escape their crumbling home. Pick your favorite and be the last one standing! 

Controls:

Player 1:

UpUp Arrow JumpLeftLeft ArrowMove LeftRightRight ArrowMove RightDownDown Arrow---ASpaceJump / ConfirmBLeft Alt, Right CtrlSpecial / CancelStartEnter---

Player 2:

Up W Jump Left A Move Left Right D Move Right Down S --- A Left ShiftJump / Confirm B Left Ctrl Special / Cancel Start Enter ---

Ronnie dashes nimbly, Thor can go invincible inside his strong shell and Chuck's wings allow him to fly! Who will reach the farthest?

Avoid spikes, pillars, fans,  and fire to outlast your opponent in this retro-styled head-to-head arcade game! 

There are also two randomly spawning Power-Ups to spice things up even more:
- Reverse Gravity
- Character Swap

Ronnie's Runners is primarily a multiplayer game but there is also a singleplayer mode for those who run alone :(. We recommend the versus mode for the best experience. To play fullscreen, please download the Windows version.

Made for the Lospec Jam 1 - https://itch.io/jam/lospec-jam-1
Resolution: 240x135px
Palette: 10 colors
TIA Sound Chip (Atari 2600)

Ronnie's Runners is made by
Art, Sound and Music: Mupix - https://twitter.com/mupixl
Programming: Iman - https://twitter.com/CloudCloak_Iman

Thanks for playing!
